snippet.title: N.E.R.O. - Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer | ESRB
snippet.description:
N.E.R.O. is coming to Nintendo Switch both digitally and physically on October 26th!

Developed by Storm in a Teacup 
Website: http://www.stcware.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/stcware
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/stcware
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/stcware

Published by SOEDESCO®
Website: http://www.soedesco.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Soedesco
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soedesco
Instagram: https://instagram.com/soedesco

About N.E.R.O.
N.E.R.O.: Nothing Ever Remains Obscure, is a touching first-person storytelling experience that takes you on a miraculous journey, through a realm of incredible beauty.  You explore the world through the eyes of a small child, who is followed around by a dark and mysterious hooded companion. Solve mystifying puzzles and wander through enchanting surroundings as you unravel the deeply touching tale of a family trying to overcome heartbreak and tragedy. But beware, because nothing in N.E.R.O. is what it appears to be at first glance...

- Experience bittersweet emotions, unraveling a touching story
- Wander through a world of incredible beauty
- Solve puzzles and decipher bewildering mysteries
- Be enchanted by a superb soundtrack and deep narrating voice
